hero.description: The all-in-one white label brokerage solution. B-Book dealing desk, real-time price feeds, CRM & KYC, crypto payments - everything included. No code required.

mission.description: NEXUS FX is a trading platform software provider, not a trading service. We provide the complete infrastructure for you to launch and operate your own Forex brokerage—transforming you from a market participant into a market maker.

whatWeProvide.title: What We Provide
whatWeProvide.description: A complete, institutional-grade white-label brokerage platform. Everything you need to run your own trading business—dealing desk, price feeds, CRM, KYC, and payment processing.

ourCoreMission.title: Our Core Mission
ourCoreMission.description: To democratize access to professional trading infrastructure. We believe anyone should be able to launch their own brokerage without needing technical expertise or massive capital.

yourTransformation.title: Your Transformation
yourTransformation.description: Stop being just a trader. With NEXUS FX, become a platform operator with full control over your brokerage business, your clients, and your revenue streams.

features.description: Get instant access to the full institutional-grade white label solution. No code required.

bBookDealingDesk.title: B-Book Dealing Desk
bBookDealingDesk.description: "God Mode" order intervention, manage PnL, set spreads, and custom slippage controls.

realTimePriceFeeds.title: Real-Time Price Feeds
realTimePriceFeeds.description: Live FX, Gold, and Indices pricing across 50+ assets with instant updates.

completeAdminPanel.title: Complete Admin Panel
completeAdminPanel.description: Full control over risk management, orders, and client management in one dashboard.

crmKycIntegration.title: CRM & KYC Integration
crmKycIntegration.description: Manage leads, documents, verification workflows, and assign agents seamlessly.

cryptoDeposits.title: Crypto Deposits & Withdrawals
cryptoDeposits.description: USDT/ERC20 and TRC20 integration directly to your wallet. No code required.

whiteLabelReady.title: White-Label Ready
whiteLabelReady.description: Full SaaS integration with your own branding, logo, and colors. Launch instantly.

howItWorks.description: Join thousands of traders who have already discovered the NEXUS FX advantage.

step1.title: Create Account
step1.description: Sign up in minutes with our streamlined KYC process.

step2.title: Fund Your Wallet
step2.description: Deposit via crypto, bank transfer, or card.

step3.title: Start Trading
step3.description: Access global markets and start building wealth.

pricing.description: Choose the plan that fits your trading needs. All plans include our core platform features.

q1.question: What is included when I purchase NEXUS FX?
q1.answer: You get the complete institutional-grade white label Forex brokerage solution including B-Book dealing desk, real-time price feeds for 50+ assets, complete admin panel, CRM & KYC integration, crypto deposit/withdrawal, and full reporting tools.

q2.question: Do I need developers or technical knowledge?
q2.answer: No code required! We handle updates, security, and hosting for you. Focus on sales and growing your business - you don't need developers, servers, or DevOps expertise.

q3.question: What markets and assets can my clients trade?
q3.answer: NEXUS FX provides access to major Forex pairs, Gold, Indices, and more across 50+ assets. All with real-time price feeds and lightning-fast execution.

q4.question: How does the white-label solution work?
q4.answer: Our Enterprise and Lifetime plans include full SaaS/white-label integration ready for your own branding, logo, and colors. Backend integration with admin controls, custom risk engine, and operator overrides are all included.

q5.question: What crypto payment options are supported?
q5.answer: We support USDT deposits and withdrawals via ERC20 and TRC20 networks directly to your wallet. No additional payment processor required.

q6.question: What is the difference between monthly and Lifetime plans?
q6.answer: Monthly plans offer flexibility with ongoing updates and support. The Lifetime plan is a one-time payment with full ownership, priority updates forever, dedicated server setup, and no recurring monthly fees.

cta.description: Join thousands of traders and brokerages who trust NEXUS FX for their success. Start your free trial today.
